scripts.build-wasm: cd src/rust-wasi-example/ && cargo build --release --target=wasm32-wasi && mkdir -p ../../public/wasm && cp target/wasm32-wasi/release/wasi-example.wasm ../../public/wasm/
scripts.dev-wasm: cd src/rust-wasi-example/ && cargo build --target=wasm32-wasi && mkdir -p ../../public/wasm && cp target/wasm32-wasi/debug/wasi-example.wasm ../../public/wasm/
scripts.dev-wasm-bindgen: yarn dev-wasm && wasm-bindgen src/rust-wasi-example/target/wasm32-wasi/debug/wasi-example.wasm --debug --keep-debug  --out-dir . && cp wasi-* public/wasm/ && mv wasi-* src && yarn dev-wasm
scripts.watchhack: while true ; do inotifywait -qm --event modify -r --format '' src/rust-wasi-example/src/ | yarn dev-wasm; done
scripts.watch-wasm: while true ; do inotifywait -qm --event modify -r --format '' src/rust-wasi-example/src/ | yarn dev-wasm; done
scripts.watch-wasm-bindgen: while true ; do inotifywait -qm --event modify -r --format '' src/rust-wasi-example/ | yarn dev-wasm-bindgen; done
